OUT.description: Path to output directory where the results will be saved.

ORGANISM.description: Target organism specified as name of the reference assembly.

ALLELES.description: Path to vcf or bed file containing allelic variants.
ALLELES.help_text: If provided, targets will be filtered for those that have a SNP within their PAM sequence.

TARGET_SIZE.description: Length of target sgRNA w/o PAM.

WINDOW_SIZE.description: Size of (sliding) genomic windows to query for CRISPR targets.
WINDOW_SIZE.help_text: Windows will overlap by one target sgRNA length (step size = window size - target sgRNA w/ PAM)

coordinate_options.title: Coordinate options
coordinate_options.description: Define chromosomal coordinates to find CRISPR targets within.

CHROM.description: Chromosome identifier for region to find CRISPR targets in.

START.description: Start coordinate for region to find CRISPR targets in.

END.description: End coordinate for region to find CRISPR targets in.
